thread.title: Twitter goes wild over Ryan Gosling's stunning sister Mandi Gosling as he takes her as Oscars date
thread.title_full: Twitter goes wild over Ryan Gosling's stunning sister Mandi Gosling as he takes her as Oscars date

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Twitter goes wild over Ryan Gosling's stunning sister Mandi Gosling as he takes her as Oscars date
text:
Showbiz Twitter goes wild over Ryan Gosling's stunning sister Mandi Gosling as he takes her as Oscars date A host of stars brought siblings and parents along on the night - including the La La Land actor Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Everyone want to know what Ryan Gosling said to this woman Share this video   
Sunday's star-studded Oscars was quite the family affair. 
Handsome actor Ryan Gosling, who was nominated for Best Lead Actor for his role as Sebastian in La La Land, wasn't joined by Eva Mendes, but instead took his older sister Mandi Gosling, who flew in from Canada for the occasion. 
Proving that good genes definitely run in the Gosling family, Mandi, who was dressed in a show-stopping glittering gold gown, stunned viewers at home. 
As cameras cut to the actor and his sibling, one commented: "We are about half way through the #Oscars and so far the big winner is anybody that gets to meet Ryan Gosling's sister." Mandi and Ryan Gosling (Photo: Getty Images North America) Actor Justin Timberlake, Oscars CEO Dawn Hudson, actor Ryan Gosling and Mandi Gosling (Photo: Getty Images North America) The pair share a hug (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
And before her identity was revealed, another asked: "Who's the babe sitting next to Ryan Gosling?? Not his lady love. Sister maybe? Random stranger? #Luckiestgirlintheworld." 
A third enamoured viewer shared: "Holy hell, just saw that the young women next to @RyanGosling was his sister, that is one hell of a gene pool they got going in that family!" 
And it wasn't just Ryan who brought along a sibling to the annual ceremony. Emma Stone with brother Spencer (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
His La La Land co-star Emma Stone, who stunned in a gold fringe Givenchy dress on the night, was accompanied by her brother Spencer Stone. Dev Patel and his mother Anita (Photo: AFP) 
And Dev Patel brought his mum Anita Patel. 
"Itâ€™s a dream to go to the Oscars with your son the actor," the proud mum said. 
"You always knew he would do well. And he has done so well." Lin-Manuel Miranda with his mom (Photo: WENN) Ryan Gosling (Photo: WireImage) Emma Stone (Photo: FilmMagic, Inc) 
Oscar nominee Lin-Manuel Miranda also took his mum as his date, revealing she watched Gilmore Girls on her phone as they rode to the ceremony in a limo. 
" nd my mom is watching Gilmore Girls on her phone on the way to the Oscars," the Hamilton star tweeted.
